Hi All
I have written an application which runs suite of tests.For each test case
class it creates a new thread and executes the particular tescase class in
that thread.I need to stop the threads which has not executed in a
particular configurable time period.i.e If the test case exceeds the
particular time period I need to destroy that thread.
Can some one give me an idea.

Regards
Mahesh
subject: test case timeout
